page.title: 18MEDIA THE TILSTON REPORTER
page.content: Tilston has a monthly newspaper called the {Tilston and Shocklach Reporter.} It is run by volunteers and compiled by a local resident. In July 1985, 293 copies were distributed by 13 people. The {Reporter}reaches the villages of {Edge, Stretton, Cardon, Kidnal Green, {Horton, Shocklach and Tilston.}The {Reporter}contains 14 pages of news and information about the various village clubs and organizations. It also contains a diary of coming events.The typing, compiling, printing and distribution are all voluntary. Recent events reported, included Â£897 raised by the Church and Â£103 raised by the school. Sometimes the{Reporter} features a local photograph on the cover. Commercial local papers include the Whitchurch Herald and Chester Chronicle.
